table.caption: Table 14 — Optional parameters for Crypt filters
head: Key
Type
Value
rows: (Optional) If present, is CryptFilterDecodeParms for a Crypt filter decode parameter dictionary.

(Optional) The name of the crypt filter that is used to decrypt this stream. The name corresponds to an entry in the CF entry of the encryption dictionary (see "Table 20 — Entries common to all encryption dictionaries") or one of the standard crypt filters (see "Table 26 — Standard crypt filter names").
Default value: Identity.
